skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: A Chaos Steed makes a fierce and intimidating mount for any conniving Sorcerer Lord.

skillTree.name: Barded Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The already-fierce Chaos Steeds are often covered in heavy armour, making them even deadlier.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: Manticores are highly prized by Sorcerers, for they are creatures bathed in magic and as cruel as their riders.

skillTree.name: Chaos Dragon
skillTree.description: Chaos Dragons were once noble rulers of the skies, now split and corrupted by the forces of Change.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Revelrous Warhost
skillTree.description: The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.

skillTree.name: Twisted Creatures
skillTree.description: All manner of terrible, twisted creations of Chaos accompany this horde.

skillTree.name: Kurgan Warchief
skillTree.description: Leading a band of raucous barbarians, this warchiefâ€™s fighters may lack the skill and equipment of Chaos Warriors, but they are ferocious in combat.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Forsaken, Chaos Troll, Chaos Spawn and Chaos Feral Manticores units

skillTree.name: Plunder the Feeble
skillTree.description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

skillTree.name: Ravenâ€™s Pact
skillTree.description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by Tzeentch and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -5

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 15
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
Melee attack and leadership: +1 for Chaos Cultists units
Armour: +6 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
Melee defence: +4 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
Melee attack and leadership: +2 for Chaos Cultists units
Armour: +12 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
Melee defence: +6 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
Melee attack and leadership: +4 for Chaos Cultists units

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: Khorneâ€™s will imbues his creatures with a vicious, unslakeable hunger for battle.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -3% for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
Charge bonus: +5 for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
Vigour loss reduction: -7% for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units

Charge bonus: +10 for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
Vigour loss reduction: -15% for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
Melee attack: +6 for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
Charge bonus: +20 for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units

skillTree.name: Blessed by Chaos
skillTree.description: Unnatural strength, an aura of dark menace, an unwavering devotion to the Chaos Gods â€“ some warriors have undoubtedly been touched by the Ruinous Ones.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
Melee attack: +1 for Khorne Berzerkers and Bloodletters of Khorne units
Weapon strength: +5% for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
Melee defence: +4 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
Melee defence: +6 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
Melee attack: +6 for Khorne Berzerkers and Bloodletters of Khorne units

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +5 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units
Weapon strength +3% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +4 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units
Charge bonus: +10 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units
Weapon strength +6% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units

Charge bonus: +20 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units
Weapon strength +12% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chaos Trolls, Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
Melee defence: +1 for Sons of the Last Plague and Plaguebearers of Nurgle units
Weapon strength: +5% for Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chaos Trolls, Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
Melee attack: +4 for Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chaos Trolls, Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units

Melee attack: +6 for Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chaos Trolls, Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
Melee defence: +6 for Sons of the Last Plague and Plaguebearers of Nurgle units

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Doomfire is a gift from Khorne, to ensure the Hellcannons speak with extra fury.

effects.description: Leadership: +1 for Zealots of Change units
Reload time reduction: +3% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Leadership: +3 for Zealots of Change units
Reload time reduction: +7% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Leadership: +6 for Zealots of Change units
Reload time reduction: +15% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to run faster for longer.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +15% for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Guided by Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Impossible foresight is granted to a few among the ranks of the Ruinous armies, allowing them to land the critical blow upon their foes.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +10% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
Ammunition: +15% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +10% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Tribes of Chaos
skillTree.description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description: Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege
Attrition suffered by defender: +20% when laying siege

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Dark Apothecary
skillTree.description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Gathering of Might
skillTree.description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Upkeep and recruitment cost: -25% for Chaos Cultists units

skillTree.name: Dark Desires
skillTree.description: Power is the only true answer!

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Infernal Dominance
backgroundSkills.description: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

ui_effects.description: âž• 75% chance to deal 75 direct damage to 1 entity per second
âž• Strong vs a single combatant
âž– Chance opponent will resist damage

backgroundSkills.name: Power!
backgroundSkills.description: I feel daemonic power within me!

backgroundSkills.name: Lord of the Horde
backgroundSkills.description: Give own power to others... Not very wise.

backgroundSkills.name: Twisted Servants
backgroundSkills.description: Spawns gather around him and hear his commands.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn units
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units

backgroundSkills.name: Chaos Trolls
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Trolls are highly honoured in the eyes of the Changer of the Ways, for rarely does any creature combine mutation with such size, power, and sheer vitality.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +25% for Chaos Troll units

backgroundSkills.name: Warriors of the Gods
backgroundSkills.description: Physically powerful, armed and armoured with both steel and sorcery, filled with evil intent. Are they even Human?

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Warrior units

backgroundSkills.name: Tamer of Giants
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Giants are instinctively drawn to those who bear the favour of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +20% for Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units

backgroundSkills.name: No rest, only blood!
backgroundSkills.description: The blood of our enemies lies here...

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen are Here!
backgroundSkills.description: Chosen wont serve this little worm, step aside!

backgroundSkills.name: Just War!
backgroundSkills.description: The Chaos Gods look on us and smile, there is only war!

backgroundSkills.name: Leader of Forsaken
backgroundSkills.description: Forsaken by the Gods, now, they fight only out of a dark, unnatural hunger and madness.
